OOC: Apologizes and mumbles incoherently about AOL.

::Firaxis::
       He wakes up again at the sound of the com.  He answers it groggily.  
"Thank you SFC, but umm, where are you and on whose authority do you offer me 
this pod?"

--part1_162.b34e43e.29d4d204_boundary
